content:
Can you provide an XML data structure that represents the menu of a restaurant and its delivery options for a website that delivers food to local people? The website allows customers to select menu items and delivery preferences from the following restaurant:
Restaurant Name: Delicious Delights
Menu Items:
| Item  | Description | Price |
|-------|-------------|-------|
| Pizza | Pepperoni   | $10   |
|       | Vegetarian  | $8    |
| Pasta | Spaghetti  | $12   |
|       | Alfredo     | $14   |
| Salad | Caesar      | $8    |
|       | Greek       | $10   |
Delivery Options:
| Option | Description   | Price |
|--------|---------------|-------|
| 1      | Standard      | $0    |
| 2      | Expedited     | $5    |
| 3      | Express       | $10   |
The XML data should include information about each menu item and delivery option, as well as their corresponding prices.

Certainly! Below is an XML data structure that represents the menu of "Delicious Delights" restaurant, including the menu items with their descriptions and prices, as well as the delivery options available:

```xml
<restaurant>
    <name>Delicious Delights</name>
    <menu>
        <item>
            <name>Pizza</name>
            <variations>
                <variation>
                    <description>Pepperoni</description>
                    <price currency="USD">10</price>
                </variation>
                <variation>
                    <description>Vegetarian</description>
                    <price currency="USD">8</price>
                </variation>
            </variations>
        </item>
        <item>
            <name>Pasta</name>
            <variations>
                <variation>
                    <description>Spaghetti</description>
                    <price currency="USD">12</price>
                </variation>
                <variation>
                    <description>Alfredo</description>
                    <price currency="USD">14</price>
                </variation>
            </variations>
        </item>
        <item>
            <name>Salad</name>
            <variations>
                <variation>
                    <description>Caesar</description>
                    <price currency="USD">8</price>
                </variation>
                <variation>
                    <description>Greek</description>
                    <price currency="USD">10</price>
                </variation>
            </variations>
        </item>
    </menu>
    <deliveryOptions>
        <option>
            <id>1</id>
            <description>Standard</description>
            <price currency="USD">0</price>
        </option>
        <option>
            <id>2</id>
            <description>Expedited</description>
            <price currency="USD">5</price>
        </option>
        <option>
            <id>3</id>
            <description>Express</description>
            <price currency="USD">10</price>
        </option>
    </deliveryOptions>
</restaurant>
```

This XML structure organizes the restaurant's menu items and delivery options clearly, making it easy to extend or modify as needed for integration into a website or application.
